        protected ComputerPlayer(Game game,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         GameColor color)
        This constructor is protected to indicate to use the PlayerFactory to create a new player of this kind
        Parameters:
        game - - a back reference to the game the player plays in
        name - - the name of the player
        color - - the color the player has in the current game
